entry.title: HybridImage的c++实现
entry.content: A hybrid image is an image that is perceived in one of two different ways, depending on viewing distance, based on the way humans process visual input. Hybrid images combine the low spatial frequencies of one picture with the high spatial frequencies of another picture, producing an image with an interpretation that changes with viewing distance.
